modName: Alyn Shir Armor - CBBEv3 - UNP - UNP-BBP
summary: This mod adds a replica of Alyn Shir's armor from Kingdoms of Amalur Reckoning for the CBBE and UNP bodies.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: - Halofarm was kind enough to convert this to the UNP body and make the weight slider work for the CBBE version. Huge thanks to him !
- UNP-BBP version is now available courtesy of Turbosundance.

Description
===========
This mod adds a replica of Alyn Shir’s armor from Kingdoms of Amalur Reckoning. The armor isn’t 100% accurate to the one in KoA due to lack of some reference images and my decisions to change/remove some things that I didn’t like.

The armor is craftable at any forge and can be enchanted. You can find it under the Leather category.

Also this is my first armor to ever make it ingame so…be gentle :)

The CBBE version requires the CBBEv3 body replacer:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

The UNP version requires the UNP body replacer:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

The weight slider is now supported for all the armor versions.


[youtube]Yyc3qv86cAg[/youtube] [youtube]IfeujVhTg_8[/youtube]
[youtube]jpaDggD8IQo[/youtube]

Install
=======
1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher and check the AlynShirArmor.esp in the Data Files section


Uninstall
=========
1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for an amazing game
Thanks to The Nexus for hosting this mod
Thanks to Caliente for the CBBE body
Thanks to Dimon99 for the UNP body
Thanks to MAK07 for his panty mesh
Thanks to Nightasy for his great tutorials
Thanks to Halofarm for converting this to the UNP body and making a weight slider for the CBBE version
Thanks to Turbosundance for making this work with BBP
author: BloodFree
